DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Increased contact diabetes care team throughout pregnancy lead improve glucose control pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Between Visit Interaction Improve Glycemic Control Pregnancy With Pre-existing Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Patient weekly contact Mayo Patient On-line Services send blood glucose reading receive recommendation back regard insulin dose change . Information analyze regard magnitude change insulin dose glycemic variability .
